## PluginRegistry.unregister() method

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Unregister a plugin and remove its capabilities from the index.

**Signature:**

```typescript
unregister(pluginId: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

pluginId


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The ID of the plugin to unregister


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

boolean

True if the plugin was found and removed
